choices: To the forest! I still wanna go camping!
1.content:
The breath is taken out of you as you reel from the strange sensation of being shrunk. When you catch your breath and are able to focus yourself on your surroundings again you come to a startling conclusion, "Everything's so BIG!" you shout to no one in particular. After comparing yourself to some plants and rocks it is quite plain that you're pretty small, one inch in height actually. Looking back at the town you were about to casually stroll of out you see it stretching endlessly onward to the horizon and the forest behind you does equally so.

Being so small it would probably be fun to explore familiar areas now turned foreign to you in your newfound size. The town has it paved roads and many adventures just waiting to be taken while the forest would grant you the camping trip of a lifetime! Where do you go?
1.title: The adventure begins

choices: The antique shop, old clocks and furniture galore!
The record shop, love that old music you can't find anywhere else.
The embroidering shop, could be interesting.
Continue on down the road to see what other establishments there are.
11.content:
Walking down the street that lay before you, you find that this looks like that special little street where all the shops with oddities and trinkets can be found. You can see the antique shop, a used record shop, an embroidering shop and a fast food place. The rest are too far away for you to see what they are currently.

The antique shop is bound to filled with lots of old things that never really have been fully examined or explored.

The record shop could be interesting as you be able to find more than just records there.

The embroidering shop sounds very cleanly and colorful, doubtless you'd get a good dosage of colors from all the yarn and other colored threads there.

The fast food place, obviously will have food in it. You had breakfast today but you can always make room for a little bit of greasy food...if you could find a way to get to it that is.

After weighing your options you decide to...
11.title: The city it is

111.content:
As you head to the antique shop, you just can't stop thinking of what kind of old cabinets, grandfather clocks, contraptions from the 1800s and whatever else could be found there, since you unfortunately never took the time to visit this store. After maybe half an hour you reach the doorway and luckily it doesn't have an extra step up before the store's ground level. Also, it being such a warm and sunny summer day the door is held open so you can just walk right in look around.


As you expected there is an ornate grandfather clock against the far wall, it doesn't seem to be ticking though. You can also see a cabinet adorned with various designs and in-laid with some pretty jewels near the sales-counter but the shopkeeper doesn't sound like they're anywhere close by, perhaps in the backroom?
111.title: Antique goods

choices: She sees the price and just sets the clock on the counter
She doesn't see the price and tests the clock to see if it works!
1111.content: You explore the store. There are a lot of cool things here! You notice an interesting cuckoo clock on the floor. You head over there when WHOOPS! you slip on the floor in some kind of sticky substance. Yuck! Just then you hear giant footsteps coming. You notice a man's HUGE tennis shoes heading toward you. You don't necessarily want to get discovered by a big fat guy nor do you want to get stepped on, so you climb up on the back of the clock to hide. The giant yells, "Honey, there's no price on this clock here! How much were you wanting to charge?" Your little eardrums ache in pain from the loud noise, but you better get out of sight! You quickly crawl in a hole in the back of the clock. You then realize the clock is simply facing backward, and this is the front where the cuckoo comes out. Just then the giant shopkeeper reaches down to pick up the clock so you jump on the cuckoo and hold on tight and hope for the best! Then, the shopkeeper's wife comes out from the back room.
1111.title: going a little cuckoo

choices: Wave excitedly at the female shopkeeper!  She sounds friendly.
Pose as a cowboy.  Yeehaw!  You don't want to be found just yet.
11112.content: The shopkeeper's wife speaks. "Hmmm honey. I don't know! I'm not sure if this thing was working right." Uh oh! She might want to test it, and if you're sitting on the cuckoo she's sure to see you. You go to jump down, but can't move! Just then you realize that the sticky substance that was on your pants must have hardened like glue. Your stuck on the cuckoo! Well, you might as well check out the giantess who's sure to discover you. You lean over and notice her cute face, probably early 30s. She has long brown hair that gently brushes against her bosom. Her breasts are AMAZING, easily big enough to completely smother a little guy like yourself! But she is married, and getting her attention is a little risky. You realize perhaps you could pretend to pose like a cowboy and if you held perfectly still she might think you're part of the clock and ignore you. But then again this is a good chance to get discovered and possibly get help being restored to normal size. Decisions, decisions!
11112.title: stuck in time

111121.content: The shopkeeper's wife trips the mechanism in the back to see if the clock works and you go rocketing out on the cuckoo. "Help" you scream and start to wave. The giantess's eyes get REAL BIG as she focuses in on you. Just then the clock reels you back in. She trips the mechanism again. Her sexy lips spread wide and a mouth that could easily swallow you whole stands right before you. She lifts a giant hand to cover it. Her slender fingers are highlighted by a 36 carat diamond ring to you! "Oh my God!" she whispers. "Are you for real?" she asks. You nod slowly, sort of overwhelmed by her sheer size. "Wow, I wonder how small are you?" You say 1 inch, but to her it sounds like a little squeak. She giggles like a school girl at you r feeble attempt at communication. "I know how to check." She then moves a 6 foot long thumbnail right up next to you. It is a beautiful shade of red, and from base to tip it is exactly the same length as you! "Looks like exactly 1 inch." A sinister smile sweeps across her face. "I guess a guy as small as you is completely helpless and totally at my mercy. But don't worry! I think you're kinda cute. And by the way, my name is Heather" Just then her husband says "Who are you talking to dear?" She decides to.....
111121.title: tiny Tim!

1111212.content:
You yell at the giantess, "You can't let him see me! He might squish me!"

She realizes that you are right, so she pulls you off of the cuckoo and puts you in her breast pocket. You are stuck in between her house sized breast and the fabric of her shirt, and you cannot move. She says, "No one, honey, I am just commenting on the clock. It works great!"

"Good!" The male giant boomed. It sounded like a train going by. "So how much did you want to sell it for?"

"I don't know, $45? That is a good deal!" She says. You can feel her heart beating behind her breast, and hear it like a drum. It begins to beat faster, and she looks down at you. She smiles, showing her car sized teeth, which is a little bit scary, but comforting at the same time.

At the end of the day, you feel very squished anyway, but the giant and giantess say goodbye for the night. After the giant is out of sight, she takes you out of her pocket, and places you on her shoulder, so you can explain everything to her. Do you?
1111212.title: Hide Me!

choices: Go to the island, perhaps even behind it.
Head to the wall of yarn and be mesmerized.
113.content:
As you head down to the embroidering shop, you stop to look at the displays shown in the windows. Behind the glass there are dozens of sewn pieces of art ranging from some simplistic shapes to gigantic tapestries conveying landscapes rivaling that of painters. In addition there is a section on the right side where different sorts of tools used in the art of sewing have been hung up.

Coming to the entrance you find the door is closed save for a small hole on one side of the door that's just wide enough for you to sidestep through slowly. The hole also seems to have a cold breeze coming from it, you figure the store has some air-conditioning on.

The hole was a tight fit, but eventually you got through it with minimal problems. Now looking into the store you can see a large island to the right of a lane running all the way back into the store. It probably contains patterns or yarn for sewing. While at the end of the lane there is a wall of many different colors of yarn, one could get lost in oneself just looking at all the different colors.
113.title: The embroidery shop

choices: Stay in the main room and look for things there.
Slip into the kitchen and explore it.
114.content:
The fast food place was pretty far away and it took a good while for you to reach the step up to the door, fortunately there was a straw laying there from the road and up to the step so that you could get up there. After climbing up the straw all you had to do was to wait for someone to leave before you enter the doorway. You took your time to look around before then and saw a couple of people inside eating away at hamburgers and fries. There was a mother with her son and daughter, two middle-aged men who wore suits and a bundle of teenagers in the back corner.

At last the men with suits left and held the door open long enough for you slip inside! As soon as you got in the smell of grease and oil hit your nose like a storm and you almost fell backward. You figure that smells are enhanced because of your small size. You can spot plenty of tables with uneaten food on them and the rest of the people there seem to be waiting for their orders. Of course you could also go into the kitchen and look for foods and adventure there. Where do you go?
114.title: Grease and oil, yum yum!

1141.content:
You walk into the main dining room, awed by the immense tables. Calling this a fast-food restaurant is kind of a misnomer; it's more of a diner, with waitresses serving the tables. But the food does come fast.

As noted before, there are a number of tables with uneaten food on them. You could go to one of 'em and try to get to it. Then again, maybe you're better off at one of the occupied tables--someone could drop a french fry or something.
1141.title: The Diner

11412.content: You're fascinated by the enormous people. All of them hundreds of feet tall--it's amazing. There are two occupied tables right now, one with a Mom and her son (who looks to be about six) and daughter (about ten or so), or a table of six teens, three boys, three girls. Which one do you go to?
11412.title: Content of Tables

choices: Climb up one of the teens to the booth above.
114122.content:
It's a quick dash through the restaurant to the oversized U-shaped booth where a passel of teens wait for their lunch. You reach the booth next to it, and slowly turn the corner underneath the table.

The first thing you see is an enormous pair of sandals, with gigantic feet and sparkling blue nail polish. Those feet connect to legs, which go up about a hundred feet or so to a pair of knees with just a swatch of a short skirt visable above them. Beyond the feet you can see another pair of smooth-shaven legs, then a couple pairs of jeans belonging to guys, then pair of capris, and a hairy-legged guy at the end of the other side of the booth.

What now?
114122.title: Teen Titans

1141221.content:
You decide to head up to the booth above you, and see what else you can see. Thinking nothing of it, you approach the legs of the girl closest to you.

The sandals are not too difficult to climb, and soon you're standing by the instep of the girl's foot. You touch it gingerly, amazed at the size of it--it's like a small house! You carefully pull yourself onto the foot, then begin the slow journey up the girl's right leg.

It's not an easy climb. The girl must have shaved recently, because there is almost no hair to grip. Still, you're almost halfway to the knee when suddenly, an enormous shadow descends. It's her hand! She must've felt you!

You cringe as the titaness....
1141221.title: Climbing Mt. Leg

choices: Jump from her hand to the table
11412212.content:
The hand surrounds you, pulling you from your place with unmatched physical strength. You cry out in terror and pain as you are borne up several hundred feet.

When the fingers uncoil - leaving you in the palm of the girl whose leg you were just climbing - you gasp in awe.

The face of the giantess dominates your world. Framed by long hair as blue as her toenails, her face looks at you in amazement. You are enraptured by her massive blue eyes, but can't help likening her gaping mouth to a bottomless pit.

Well, your journey was quicker than expected - what should you do now?
11412212.title: Yes, It's All Blue

choices: To tortures you under her feet
114122121.content:
"HELP! I'M SHRUNK!"

She looks at you, and decides...
114122121.title: Talk to the girl

choices: Move on to the next one.
1141222.content: Everything was so large, it took you some time to really take in the massive figures all around you. The girl closest to you, the one wearing sandals, shifted her foot, and it landed right in front of you. An in h closer and you would have been crushed! The cheesey scent of sweaty sandal feet was the first thing you noticed as the large toes flexed in front of you. The blue nail polish seemed rather fresh, and her skin was well cared for.
1141222.title: Hang out by the feet.

choices: Climb the mop in search of a snack.
Go to the bucket, you wanna be clean!
1142.content:
The floor is quite dirty and many places have dried up bits of ketchup, spills of salt, puddles of soda. You avoid the dirty spots as much as you can while you sneak across the floor and to the kitchen area. Eventually you reach it and in the process you've gotten lots of soda and ketchup on you from the times you accidentally fell into some of the spills.

You can't think of any way to get cleaned up at your size so you just decide to continue on. Upon entering the kitchen you find that the floor is a bit cleaner than outside, but still pretty dirty. There are a few employees running about swiftly making sure that everything is kept nice and fast in their food making.

You spot a mop leaning up against one counter, perhaps you could climb up it and get a snack? Also there is a bucket, probably for cleaning the floor against a wall across the floor from you. It has a cloth hanging out that you could maybe climb up, jump in, wash off and be clean again.
1142.title: The not so clean kitchen

11421.content:
You make the long climb up the mop, always ensuring you won't fall on the next move; then you swing and land on the work surface, you see a giant bunch of fries and head straight for them.

As you start to nibble on one of the fries a sudden movement sweeps you and the fries into a giant cardboard packet; you realise you are about to go on a tray destined for a customer, you are both desperate and nervous to call out.

Who are you to be served to?
11421.title: Small Fry!

114211.content: You look up and see a woman grabbing the tray and starts to walk away. She sits the tray down onto the table and notice she has her kids with her a boy about six and a girl about five. You are getting worried and continue to remain hidden in the fry container. Suddenly the container moves as she lifts it off the tray and sets it down in front of..
114211.title: The Woman and her Kids

114212.content: You peer out of the fry box, which is now your prison. Unfortunately, you are part of a double bacon cheeseburger meal. The tray is set down on the counter with a jolt, and you are placed along with the burger inside a bag. Listening to the sounds of the fast food joint, you hear two giant booming male voices outside. You can't understand what they're saying, but you're pretty sure the meal is being paid for. Cautiously, you make your way to the highest point of the french fry box and look out. Greeting your eyes is a giant, well-toned, shirtless, male torso. Craning your neck you look up to see the body belongs to...
114212.title: Served

1142121.content: Matt picks the bag up. He's always been taller (he's 6'4'' and you're 5'8'') and more athletic than you. And the most uncomforting fact about him dawns upon you: he has a huge appetite, and you're part of his meal. He casually walks out of the resturant and back to his place, a block away. By the time he sits down for lunch, he's starved. And, you're on his plate.
1142121.title: Paid for

choices: Got to the video rental store.
Continue down to the road split.
115.content: After walking for what seems an eternity you finally pass by the first set of stores and shops you were at. Now before you there are two more shops, one of them seems to be a clothes store but it has large signs reading "under construction" on it while the other looks like a video rental store. The street you were walking on has also come to an end now, it splits two ways at the end going into the center of the town on one side and leading out of town on the other.
115.title: Past the four stores.

1152.content:
You continue down the sidewalk towards the road split, thinking you'll probably head to the town center--after all, if you'd wanted to leave town, you would've kept on going into the woods. It takes you about an hour, but you reach the road split. And then you realize a problem: if you want to continue on to the center of town, you're going to have to cross the street!

Now, you've been dodging the giant people who populate this town pretty successfully, but you're not so sure about your ability at 1" tall to dodge a car moving...well, if it was going 30 miles per hour, that'd be like mach three to you. Yikes.

So standing on the corner, you realize that if you want to cross, you're going to have to wait for help.

It takes about ten minutes, but help finally arrives in the person of three girls. They all look to be in their mid-teens; must be our on the town for the afternoon. You don't have forever to choose, so you go with the two girls bracketing you. Do you jump on the sandals of the girl to your left, or the tennis shoes of the girl to your right?
1152.title: Waiting for a Lift

choices: she steps on you thinking you are a bug
she sees you and tries to scare you
11521.content: the girl feels you on her foot and shakes you off then towers over you in anger.
11521.title: yikes

choices: Let go and wait for someone else
11522.content:
Your decision isn't hard to make. The tennis shoes have laces to grab ahold of, and you won't be squished between giant toes...

The next few moments are a blur. You wait anxiously for a moment to strike, and catch the end of a lace in the midriff. It knocks the wind from your lungs, but you manage to grab on tightly enough to be carried along with the walking goddess.

Of course, as the lace is dragging along the floor, it isn't too comfortable...

You could climb for higher ground, away from the pounding ground that is slowly breaking your bones, but that would mean chancing losing your grip and falling off.

Maybe you should just let go willingly, and try to find some other means of crossing the road?
11522.title: YEEEEE-haw!

115221.content:
You've got a grip on the shoelace; there's no tellin' when another bus will be by at this time of day. So grimacing, you pull yourself bit-by-bit up the lace, until you've managed to get off the ground. Now you just whip occasionally into the side of the shoe, rather than against the ground.

The girls walk across the street nonchalantly, and presently, you're at the other side. Do you drop off the shoe now (even though it's still in motion), or wait for the girl to stop for a minute?
115221.title: Why Did Tim Cross The Road?

1152212.content:
You cling to the girl's shoe, hoping that she'll stop soon. But she keeps walking into town, the doorways whizzing by as the three girls walk down main street of your sleepy city.

The girls finally pause, and you realize that they're turning to go into a store. You realize quickly you're entering...
1152212.title: Destination Unknown

11522121.content:
As the girl enters the ice cream shop, the sweet smell coming from the ice cream reach your nose.

The commotion of the roller coaster ride finally came to a halt. You saw that the girl and her friends are viewing the ice cream and discussed what they were going to get. This gave a good minute to decide if you were going to stay holding onto her shoe lace or get off the shoe now.

What do you do?
11522121.title: Ice Cream Parlor

115221212.content: You let go of her shoe lace and took a look at your surroundings, there were a few people eating ice cream at the tables and only the three girls waiting in line. You also saw a half door that lead to back of the counter where the server the ice cream with a crack big enough for you to fit under. So where do you go?
115221212.title: Get off and explore

choices: she puts her shoe back on squishes you
11522122.content: she enters the store and heads straight for the shoe department. then she takes off her shoes and tries on another pair. you then accidentaly fall inside of her smelly tennis shoe.
11522122.title: trapped

115221221.content:
Hitting the squishy sole of the girl's tennis shoe, your nose is immediately filled with the foul scent of foot sweat and toe jam. You are in complete disgust, and trying your best not o throw up. Looking up you try to scan the opening of the shoe for a spot to climb out of. But due to your small stature you are given no options. And then looking more into the sneaker you see the imprint of this girl's that looks well worn in. You hope that you don't have to head in that direction because you can smell it gets worse the closer to the toe section.

Meanwhile the girl has decided to buy a pair of shoe's she tried on. So after placing the new pair back in the shoe box for purchase. She walk's back to her pair of tennis shoe's. Picking them up with ease, she begins putting them on like normal.

Looking up you see the gigantic socked foot starting to enter the shoe. Seeing no other choice you begin your run towards the toe section. But you then trip over a piece of toe jam and *SQUISH*. Your body is instantly paralyzed. But seem's this new height come's with some survival durability. As you are no longer able to move your body from the neck down. You are still alive. For now at lest. As you are now under the girl's foot arch.

She didn't notice a thing and then just began her walk to the counter. All the while causing more and more harm to you. With each step you become more and more squished. And by the end of the day you really are dead and plastered as a sole decal. And that is where your body remain's for the rest of eternity.
115221221.title: Your tomb is some girl's Shoe

choices: Hitch a Ride on the Goddess Foot
115221222.content: The goddess puts her shoe back on, but you slip in beside her big toe. You are stuck inside er shoe, unable to move, beside her smelly feet. You hit her toes to try to get her to notice you, but your motion is severely restricted. She leaves the store with her friends shortly after. You can hear them talking through the shoe, and they tell each other that they will meet up again tomorrow. You are carried to the girls house, where the shoes are taken off. The giantess leaves, and you have some choices!
115221222.title: Take Me Home!

1152212222.content:
You watch as the goddess walks away. It feels nice to finally be off the roller coaster of her foot.

She walks into the living room plops unto the couch and turns on the television. You briefly try to survey the house. As far as you can tell, she's the only person (other than you) home right now, although a few other pairs of shoes in front of the door tell you she's not the only resident.

You have two options: try to get her attention in the living room or scavenge for food in the kitchen. Which do you choose?
1152212222.title: Survey the Situation

choices: she acts like shes going to step on you
she grabs you with her toes
115222.content: you fling yourself off of her shoe and back onto the pavement. thats when you spot a giant barefooted girl coming your way.
115222.title: giant girl

1152222.content:
You cringe as the giant sole descends on top of you, but are picked up by the foot instead of crushed. You get caught in between her toes, and inadvertently carried with her. The girl is completely oblivious to the fact that you are in her toes. You now have a ride, but you need to get on top of her foot, or risk being crushed. You cautiously clamber onto the top of her foot, but she doesn't notice. You hold onto her foot, and hope that she stops soon so that you can get a better grip. Almost like on cue, she walks into the fast food restaurant, and you have your chance.

Do you climb her leg and get into her pocket, or find a new transport?
1152222.title: Snatched Up?

choices: Jump onto  the White girl's sandal
Jump onto the Hispanic girl's flip flop
11522222.content:
You hop off of the girls foot and search for a different source of transportation, looking around you see two girls who appear to be heading for the exit.

The girl on the left was a white teenager with blonde hair wearing a blue shirt, grey pants, and sandals.

The girl on the right was a teenage Hispanic wearing a red t-shirt and black jeans along with her black flip flops.
11522222.title: Not The Best Transportation

choices: Make a bridge out of stuff you find on the forest floor.
Walk to the left, downstream in the hopes of finding a natural bridge.
Walk to the right, upstream so that you may find a bridge.
Make a raft and follow the flow downstream to it's outlet.
12.content:
You decide to continue with your camping trip as you had planned originally, though it probably will be at a different spot since it would take you days to get to the place you had in mind. As soon as you turn around to head you into the forest you manage to trip on a root at waist-height and fall flat on your face. Upon impact you give out a cry of frustration and pain.

Picking yourself up and checking your face you have sustained just a tiny little bruise on your cheek. Grumbling and making fussy noises you continue on into the forest until you get to a small stream, which now seems like a silent, strong current running before you. There are some twigs and other pieces of bits and things on the forest floor you might be able to make a bridge out of, or you could walk along the stream until you reach a natural, more sturdy bridge to cross with. What will you do?
12.title: My, what a big root you have grandma...

choices: Go to the left, down into the muddy area?
Do some hiking and go up the hillside?
121.content:
Gathering up the largest twigs and pine-needles you can carry, you start construction of the bridge. Pebbles are out of the question since they're simply too large for you but you start laying down some groundwork anyways. Starting with twigs you lay them half in the stream and half on land to make sure the bridge doesn't drift away. Gradually you work your way across laying new pieces where they seem least likely to give away and with only one exception where a pine-needle floated away you successfully cross the stream and stand proud on the other side of it.

Now with the stream matter out of the way, you look to other directions. The ground slopes up to your right up to a rocky hillside. On your left, downstream, the ground leads into a muddy area with lots of plant-life. Straight ahead is not an option as there is a sharp rise in the terrain, almost like a cliff covering your view in that direction.
121.title: Conquering the raging river...stream

choices: Go out into the wide open forest
1212.content: You decide to head upstream in the direction of the hill. The landscape slopes up as you eventually reach the end of the earthen cliff blocking your view past the stream before. You can see the forest stretching for many lengths as the trees are spaced widely and the ground is flat. The sun filters through the trees in many places giving them a very idyllic look. Behind you, the stream stretches far down into the depths of the forest and reaches a pond with some marshy looking ground around it, the water there glistens in the sun and you can see the flies, fish and plants in the water. Further up the hill you can see it coming to a ledge with a dark, looming cave in the wall on the far end.
1212.title: An overview

choices: Go down the passage with sand.
Go down the passage under the stream.
12122.content: You make the rest of the climb up to the cave and peer in. The air coming out of it is fresh and damp, you see the cave leading down and bending to the left. Stepping inside it you find the floor to be covered with sand, making for comfortable walking. As you trek down and into the cave and around the bend, you come to a forked path. On one side there is a continuation of the sandy path leading deeper down into the cave. On the other side there is a stony water-worn passage leading under the stream you crossed.
12122.title: The cave

choices: Try and Escape, she might want to squish me!
Stay, Perhaps I could Help her Understand Humanity!
121221.content:
As you hike down deeper into the caverns you find the light becoming dimmer; to aid your eyesight you take out your torch and switch it on to see where you're going.

Carefully stepping down underground you hear a disturbing sound, a deep, but quick, breathing; the sound of an animal breathing magnified from your smaller size. Just then you realise something.

"Of course," You call out to no-one, "I'm inside a rabbit warren; that's why the tunnel curved and forked, rabbits always dig their runs in a bow-shape!" But you spoke so loudly you've aroused the curiousity of a rabbit; the shockwaves caused by the movements of this mighty rabbit knock you over and you slide towards the oncoming beast.

You are stopped by a giant forepaw, looking up you find yourself looking into the eyes of a gargantuan rabbit doe burning with curiousity; you feel happy that your small size makes her kind fear you no longer, but something about a rabbit that size seems to say that you must get away. But this rabbit wouldn't eat you, would she? Should you...
121221.title: Are Rabbits REALLY Vegetarian?!?

choices: Try to Eliminate You, all Humans are Bad in her Eyes!
1212211.content:
Terrified that she might be full of anger because of your kind ruining nature, you pick yourself up and attempt to run from the warren; thinking that you're making good progress you run blindly. Then something heavy, but not deadly, pins you on your belly; carefully turning your head you see that this doe has you pinned beneath one of her forepaws.

"Please madam," You beg her, "Don't kill me! Don't squash me!" She lowers her huge muzzle towards you. "And PLEASE," You add, "Don't EAT ME!!!" Her mouth doesn't open, she just carefully rubs her giant nose against you, you feel her breath washing over your miniaturized body as she sniffs at you.

Lifting her head she winkles her nose; you fear that your human scent will fill her with blood-lust! Will she...
1212211.title: You are HERS!

choices: Let Her take Care of you!
Try and Escape when her Back is Turned!
12122111.content:
You realise you've dropped your torch, which explains the weaker light; observing it over to your right you try to reach it, but the giant doe is pinning you down so you can't reach far. Then she lifts her right forepaw to brush her nose, causing a landslide towards you that brings your torch within reach; then as she places her forepaw back on the ground she opens her mouth and comes straight for you.

"NOOOO!!!" You cry out in the anticipation of her about to eat you; instead she just painlessly, but firmly, picks you up in her mouth and carries you deeper into the warren.

The way she moves through the runs seems to suggest that she's saying mockingly 'Fee fie fo fum'. Eventually she stops and carefully lowers you to the ground; looking round you see that you're in a burrow, it must be hers; you look up at her peering down at you, what seems to be a smile is spreading across her muzzle.

"Oh, my god!" You whisper, realising that she wants to keep you as a pet. Should you...
12122111.title: A Rabbit's Pet

choices: Rabbit plan on make you her baby!
121221111.content: Let her take care of you? you thought "Well there no way I could figure out which of tunnel would lead me out of here, so I guess best thing let Rabbit take care of me!" and with that Rabbit slowly tear off all your clothes, as you scream "OH NO I NAKED!" Rabbit slowly lick your body and you hope she not plan to eat you!
121221111.title: Let Her take Care of you!

choices: Forced you suck on her teat
Slowly apart her wet vulva lips and then push you inside of it!!
1212211112.content: Rabbit didn't plan on eat you but instead made you one of her baby. "Come on please stop lick me!" You complain while squirming to get away but Rabbit continued lick you including licked in between you're crotch area. "Wo Hey Stop that, not lick me there!!!" You yelled and try get away! Rabbit slowly stop for moment to look at you and then started to.
1212211112.title: Rabbit plan on make you her baby!

choices: The rabbit realizes you're gone, and comes looking for you!
121221112.content:
You feel like it would be safe with this rabbit... She hasn't tried to hurt you yet, and you think that going around the forest at your size would be very dangerous. But at the same time, you hate the idea of being soem sort of pet to this rabbit, even if it would mean safety. You're still a human, and you feel like you should hang onto some dignity.

And so, when the rabbit turns and goes deeper into her burrow, going somewhere you don't care to know about, you get up and run as wuickly and quietly as you can. You're making good progress, heading through the tunnels in a way you onky hope leads to the surface....
121221112.title: Try and Escape when her Back is Turned!

1212211122.content:
The rabbit doesn't seem to notice you fleeing the burrow, and you keep running as fast as possible, making your way through the tunnels. Eventually, you see light ahead, and finally reach the entrance of the burrow. Running outside, you glance around to confirm that there are no other animals in sight before you sigh and jog to a nearby rock, taking cover behind it while you catch your breath. You just escaped the rabbit, which is good, but you're still tiny and still stuck in these woods. The novelty of being tiny is wearing off, and you're starting to fear what it might mean if you're tiny forever.

As you sit there, breathing heavily behind the rock, you suddenly realize that there's something else you should be fearing instead...
1212211122.title: You make it out safely!

choices: Walk around the pond to reach the other side of the stream?
Continue down the landscape into the forest depths?
122.content:
You start walking down to the left, following the stream's current. Ahead of you there is a small pond overgrown with plants and with flies buzzing around it. Without even stepping close you can see that much of the ground before you is soft and treacherous to walk on so you'll need to be careful where you step.

As you near the water's edge you can see guppies and other small marine animals swimming about at high speeds looking for nutrition in the rich environment. The plants above water consist of lily pads and some water plants with large stalks that you can't identify while underwater there are many soft looking leaves just swaying with the current and giving some shelter for the small fish there. The water has a yellow-ish tint to it making it seem more alive.

After observing the water for a few more minutes you figure that you should get going. The stream ends at this little pond and so you could walk around it to reach the other side, while on the other hand you could continue in the same direction further down into the forest.
122.title: The small pond

choices: Go swimming in the perfect waters of the pool.
Continue walking around the pond to the other side.
1221.content:
Walking along the side of the pond, you come to a small partly closed off area, like a pool. The waters there are clear and the bottom filled with sands. A reflection of everything around you can be seen in it and that means <b>everything</b>, all the trees, the sky, the water plants, the flies, yourself and the shine of the sun. It's one of the most beautiful bodies of water you've ever seen. The little pool opens up into the rest of the pond too so that the water doesn't become stale.

Since it's such nice weather out you think maybe that going for a swim would be an option, how about it?
1221.title: Such a beautiful little pool

12212.content: You decide you really need to get moving this isnt a good thing you need to find help, not swim. you continue walkin and you hear a stomping a rustle and then you see something. The group of campers! You look up and see the faces. Amber, Cassie, Joe, Melony, Sarah, jen, Darren, Jeremey and Briana.. They all came towards you and walked past. You could get help with them. you look where there headed and apperently yoyu passed right by the camp sight. you could walk there by your slef and wait for help or hitch a ride with your friends. You dont know what to do, your friend melony begins to near you and you need to make up your mind.
12212.title: reunition

choices: Climb Up Her Leg and into the Safety of Her Inner Jeans
122121.content: You sprint to Melony's predicted path and prepare to jump onto her booted foot. You grab onto her lace as she walks by, and hoist yourself up onto her hiking boot, and hang on as she follows your friends to camp site. Maybe you will camp at the original site after all! The only problem is that Mel is walking through weeds and roots the size of tall trees. You are nearly getting thrown off at every enormous weed! You have to make a choice.
122121.title: Hop onto Mel

1221211.content: You climb up in her inner jeans does she feel you?
1221211.title: Feels of the jeans

1222.content:
You continue down the landscape into the depths of the forest, amazed at the height of the plantlife. The trees rise up into infinity, and the grasses--well, the grasses look like trees. A few times you run from enormous bugs, but for the most part it's pleasant, if odd.

After an hour or two you come upon an enormous dirt road. It takes you a few moments to recognize it for what it is--a narrow hiking path through the woods. You could follow it and see where it leads, or you could keep up your cross-country trek.
1222.title: Into the Woods

choices: A deer crossing the path in front of you
A young woman hiker waking up the path
12221.content: After thinking it over, Following the path seams a good idea. At for the first few minuties it's a pleasant walk. Then the ground beings to shake. Someting big (well at this size everything is big) is comming. It's....
12221.title: down the path

122211.content:
You watch on in awe as a humongous deer crosses the path, every step she (no antlers) takes causes great shock-waves that would knock you over if you were still standing; just as she's about to disappear into the woods she stops and turns towards you, you feel nervous as the thundering deer-goddess approaches you with her vast hooves slamming into the ground sending meteorite-like lumps of soil to scatter around her. You pray that she will not step on you and that none of those terrifying lumps of soil will not bash your vital organs out; she comes closer and closer and the shock-waves get more and more violent, you cringe in the fear that her great size will cause her to squish you.

Instead she stops what to you seems like 24ft away (close enough for such a mighty creature) and she lowers her mighty muzzle, her enormous eyes fixed upon you; you realise she's spotted you and is investigating, at what seems like a distance of 12ft she starts sniffing you. You try to find something to stop her inhaling sucking you up into one of her monstrous nostrils, but you fail and the power of her sniffing sweeps you off your feet and right up her left nostril; she lifts her giant head with your upper half managing to stay outside her nose.

She strides through the forest with you blocking one of her nostrils, she occasionally moves to lick her nose causing your head to get soaked in deer spit, but something about a titanic deer licking you seems to give you bliss. What's going to happen?
122211.title: Big Bambi!

1222111.content:
Whatever bliss you were gaining from hanging out of the doe's nostril and being licked turns to horror as the huge tongue finally dislodges you and pulls you into the mouth. The doe, a nice herbivore as she is, lowers her head spit you. The doe's jaws part to create a gap through which light spills in and your heart is filled by relief. As you rapidly descend towards the ground the light allows you a quick glance at the doe's mouth. Pieces of vegetation lie here and there, pools of saliva there and here to say nothing of the humidity and smell (perhaps not so bad, but not pleasant either). Nothing you see looks very attractive and you are glad that you'll be out in no time.

As you are about to pop out you brush against the doe's taste buds. Then, instead of hitting the ground you bash against her front incisors. You barely have time to realize that the gap was not wide enough when it quickly closes and you are once again sealed in darkness. Indeed, as you brushed against those taste buds the doe caught a salty taste which resembled something heavenly. Her memory returns to that time when she gained the chance to taste one of those salt-licks which humans would give their horses. A delicious taste. Now, this morsel inside her mouth tastes just like one. She links you with food! You are assaulted by her massive tongue. Saliva soaks your entire body. The doe presses you against the roof of her mouth and sucks at your puny, but delicious form. She decides to let her guard down and expresses her enjoyment through small vocalizations. This moment is too good for her to let pass in a whim. For you, the experience is far from great. The tongue tosses you around, slime gathers around you and one time you even scrape against her rear incisors, cutting your arm, but not seriously. You scream and squirm, but your efforts are nothing against the doe's mighty tongue; your puny screams nothing against the bursts from her vocal chords. Quickly, the torture (ecstasy to another) comes to a climax as the doe sucks on you hard one last time before flicking you into the confines of her throat.

--- GULP ---

The doe has a quick look around her. She sighs as she feels the morsel squirm down her throat. Quickly, she rips a hunk of fresh grass from the forest floor, chews it into a mush and swallows. Then she trodes off and disappears into the trees with you inside her belly, never to be seen again.
1222111.title: Snack for a Doe

1222112.content:
As you hang from the doe's nostril you realize that she is taking you deeper into the forest. Her scent is strong in your nostrils, but then again you probably don't smell any better to her. The doe breaks into a hop. The trees and creepers swish past you. If it weren't for your position you would probably enjoy the ride, but the constant jumping makes you feel sick. Just when you feel like vomiting the doe stops. She once again attempts to lick you out of her nose (without doubt, it must be uncomfortable for her) and actually manages to dislodge you. Your brief joy is quickly gone when she pulls you into the confines of her mouth. The hopping continues.

The doe's mouth is hot, humid and, of course, very wet. Though you can't see you can feel strings of saliva wrapping around you like rope as the hopping makes you fly about in the disgusting maw. As if that were not enough, the doe begins tasting you. She pushes you around, presses you against the roof of her mouth and once she even placed you between her incisors and gently squeezed your puny form. You are too overwhelmed to scream, but you quickly gain the strength to fight back. You squirm with all your might, but this causes you to slip under her tongue. The doe seems to find this good and leaves you there. Saliva pools around you and you must strive for breath. Yet, this only fills your nostrils with the stench of the doe's own breath which, though not so bad, still isn't something you would like to smell.

As you lay there you cannot prevent questions from filling your head. Where was the doe taking you? Why did she take you? Was she going to eat you? If so why hadn't she already done so? Did she know you are a human? Was she planning to torture you for revenge? Your thoughts are interrupted as the hopping stops and you find yourself being spat out. As you tumble out of the doe's maw you prepare for a hard landing, but instead you land on soft moss. It takes you time to get yourself together. You try to stand up, but the moss is too soft to do so. You tumble backwards and your vision is filled by a huge muzzle. The doe's muzzle.

- Enjoy the ride? she asks mockingly.

You are taken aback. Did that doe just talk?

- You can... talk? you ask with shock.

The doe pulls back with surprise.

- You can talk? she asks with equal shock.

- Of course I can talk, you say insulted. - It's you who is..., your words are cut off. Indeed, you are not talking in any human language. You were talking... talking... what you were talking goes over your head. Something... deerish you guess.

- Awww... my little human can talk. And has a temper as well, the doe says with awe. She presses her nose against your body and nuzzles you gently. You roll to the side and shout at her.

- Hold on! What do you mean 'your little human'? I'm not your's! I belong to myself!

The doe pulls back a bit insulted.

- Very well little human. I won't force you to be mine. In fact, if you wish, you may leave. Go ahead, leave.

She allows you to have a look around. You are in a small clearing. From all sides you are beset by dense trees. Who knows how far the nearest humans were. You still think the hike is worth it. You manage to scramble to your feet and head for the trees as doe adds;

- By the way. You tasted delicious and that's saying a lot as we deer are picky eaters. I'm sure there are many, less picky eaters, in there who would gladly offer you a cozy place inside their stomachs.

Your blood runs cold. The thought of predators had not occurred to you. At your size you are sure to attract predators as an easy meal. The choice was yours. Would you stay with the doe who would make you a pet or even a slave or would you risk your dear life in those woods. After some thought you decide to...
1222112.title: The Doe

choices: You So Cute Maybe I could keep you as my baby
You So Silly Along be cute but now it time to sleep
12221122.content: You Stay because you didn't want risk your dear life in woods where giant wild animals would tried eat you! As you look at doe and said I will stay here but this not mean I am agree to be your slave or anything! Doe jump in delight which cause earth to shake as you fell down because you lost your balance! Doe start giggle as she see you fell down on your butt and she couldn't helped as she lower her head down and slowly lick your body while your body get press against soft moss! You yell for Doe to stop but she giggles as she said
12221122.title: Stay

choices: Let you nurse on mommy teat nipped for milk
Let you become mamas real baby" as she reveal her wet vulva and insert you into
122211221.content: You're so tiny and cute maybe I could keep as my baby?" As you immediately shake you're head no and reply "No way I am not become you're baby!" She look at you and giggles more and said "Oh is my baby felt fussy would not worry mommy made it better by?"
122211221.title: You So Cute Maybe I could keep you as my baby

122212.content:
You struggle to maintain your balance, and turn around to see a four-hundred-foot tall girl walking up the path. You don't recognize her--must be an out-of-towner in for the day to hike. She's wearing brown hiking boots, with thick brown socks sticking out a few feet above them. Then long, well-muscled legs leading up to khaki hiking shorts a long way up. Further above is a t-shirt, a backpack, and a pretty face, with black hair tied back in a pony tail.

The woman stops about a football field away from you--or in the real world, about four feet. The air is split by a deafening sound, which causes you to cover your ears. "COME ON, GUYS! THE CAMPSITE IS JUST A HALF-MILE FROM HERE."

You feel the ground shaking again as a few of the girl's cohorts walk into view. It looks like a group of friends are camping for the weekend--two other girls and a guy are walking up the path.

While the girl is stopped, you consider your options. It might be kind of fun to camp with this group--after all, you have all your gear with you. You could set up camp in the shadow of their tents. Then again, maybe you should just steer clear of these giants.
122212.title: The Enormous Campers

1222121.content:
You were going to set up camp anyway, why not do it in the company of these guys? Besides, the girl who's currently standing and waiting for her friends is pretty cute; you wouldn't mind hanging around with her for a little while.

Quickly, you sprint down the path towards the young woman, hoping she won't start moving for a minute or so. Half a mile down the road is about thirty-six miles to you, and you don't want to walk it alone.

Soon, you've reached the girl's feet. You stare up in awe at the monumental woman. Without hesitation, you run to her boots and pull herself up onto them. You've just about reached the top when she starts to walk back down the trail.

The first step is enough to shake you to your core. You barely hang on to the shoelaces atop her boot as the foot slams hard against the dirt. Then you're moving, and those steps are quick and jarring. You struggle to hold on all the way to the campsite....
1222121.title: Step Lively

choices: Wait for them to put up their tents, and camp inside one
12221212.content:
The juddering, shaking motion continues for what seems like hours, but is probably merely minutes. You manage to hold onto a shoelace to keep yourself steady, but you can't say that you enjoy the experience.

The site they eventually pick seems pretty perfect, one that you'd have chosen yourself if given the chance.

Shaded by trees, but still letting some sun through, it's a fairly spacious (well, city-sized to you) expanse of grass, with relatively few rocks disturbing the terrain.

You hurridly climb off as your ride prepares to put up her tent, and then run for cover as four giants begin stomping around the clearing, looking for the best spot. You don't want to get stepped on!

As you hide behind a mountainous stone, you ponder where to put your own tent. While it would be nice to sleep under the stars, you have to admit to yourself that it would be dangerous. A single drop of rain could crush you, to say nothing of night-time predators...

Perhaps it would be safer to camp inside the tent of one of the giants?
12221212.title: Setting up Camp

122212122.content:
Discretion is the better part of valor, and you have to admit that if a squirrel happened upon you in the dark of night, you'd be a goner. If you happened to be ensconsed in one of the tents, though, you'd have help from a giant friend--even if they didn't know they were helping you per se.

Anyhow, you watch the giants unpacking their gear, and then watch them split into two pairs working on tents. The group farthest from you includes the brunette who so generously gave you a ride to the campsite, and a shorter, skinnier girl with short blonde hair. The pair closest to you is the guy and a girl who looks at least part Latina. Midway through, the guy gives the girl a swat on the butt, telling you beyond doubt that they're at least dating.

You consider which pair to go with, the two girls or the couple?
122212122.title: Pitching Tents

choices: Watch the giants some more first
1222121221.content:
Your chosen tent is the furthest from where you stand, so you have to carefully evade the still-linked couple on your way.

The opening is like the gateway to Olympus! Cautiously, you move to the edge, peering inside at the goddesses within.

Your ride is standing nearest to you, at the end of a purple mass that can only be a sleeping bag. Her companion is at the end of the tent - a few hundred feet away - preparing to spread her own on the ground.

You are almost knocked off your feet by the breeze caused by the sleeping bag being laid upon the ground. You steady yourself to see the blonde stepping over the orange surface, towards her friend. Looks like they've chosen their sleeping arrangements.

You gaze up at the giantesses, wondering what they're whispering about. Perhaps you should pitch your tent while they're talking? Or should you wait a few hours for them to go to sleep? Do you REALLY want to be lugging your kit around with you while they're gathered around a campfire...
1222121221.title: Your Turn

12221212211.content:
There's no reason to wait--these two appear to be gossiping about something or other, they're not going to notice you. So carefully, you survey the tent for a suitable site.

In a few moments, you've found it--on the far side of the tent, away from the opening. The brunette and the blonde both have set their backpacks against the back, and a few clothes are already unpacked. The perfect place for your tiny strips of fabric (your backpack and your tent) to blend in. Careful not to attract attention, you edge your way along the tent wall and then along the mammoth orange sleeping back en route to your own personal campsite.

It takes about fifteen minutes to reach your destination, and by then the two girls have left. That's fine by you, as you now have plenty of time to set up. In the lee of the blonde's enormous blue backpack, you lay out your sleeping bag and set your own pack down. (You decide against pitching your own tent; why would you, when you're already indoors?) After getting situated, you decide that now is the time to exit the tent and see what's going on with your new "friends."

You start to walk back the way you came when someone enters. It's....
12221212211.title: Encampment

122212122111.content:
[The option for the brunette links to the blonde]

The sky is torn open with a tremendous zipping noise, and a boot the size of a house crashes to the floor frighteningly close. It is followed moments later by another, and attached to them is a towering brunette, the size of a skyscraper.
She turns partway back out and shouts something. It's barely intelligible at your scale, more of an earthquake than a sound. Then she turns back towards you and takes a couple of steps closer.
Her left shoe crashes down only a few feet away, and the ground trembles. Moments later, she sits, and the tremors from her ass slamming down knock you off your feet. You stumble towards the shoe and land face-first in its shadow. The treads alone are as tall as you are. Her hands move towards the other shoe, a far defter movement than seems possible for something so enormous. In moments, the shoelaces are undone and a dark-green-socked foot emerges from the shoe. Now it's the closer shoe's turn. The shoelaces swing wildly as she undoes the knot, and you run. Soon, the knots are undone and her left foot, too, is free. It raises up from the shoe and slams down...
122212122111.title: The Brunette

choices: ...and her toes crash down only inches away
1222121221111.content:
It feels like being punched by a mountain.

Luckily, she didn't lower her heel all the way and you're merely knocked down and stunned rather than being turned into a splatter of guts, splintered bone, and blood. But now, you're trapped between a sweat-soaked sock and the nylon of the tent and can barely move. You're assaulted by smells and drenched in salty liquid. Fortunately for you, though, her foot soon moves up again. You look above you and see her pulling the sock off and tossing it aside. Bits of lint, sweat, and mud cover the sole of her pinkish-olive foot. You barely have time to react when her foot comes down towards you once more...
1222121221111.title: ...and you're trapped underneath

choices: Choice 1 - into the boot you go.
Choice 2 - Trampled by a group of girls.
12221212211111.content:
You watch dreading what you know is about to happen. The pinkish-olive sweat soaked bare sole of her foot falls upon you but miraculously you survive. Apparently the tent wasn't fixed on firm ground and so her foot and you along with it sunk into the nylon covered floor. you now however had the problem of being trapped under a giant smelly, sweaty mass of doughy flesh ripe from the time in the boot. She takes a step forward highlighting the problem you dreaded, you are stuck to her sole. From outside you hear people talking then you hear a sentence that you fear. "Hannah..."

1. Do you want to come outside. (puts the boot on without socks and with you still trapped against her foot)

2.Where are you (group of girls enter tent, more foot fun!)
12221212211111.title: ...and this time, there's no escape

122212122111111.content: You cried out as the sole lifted, and inserted into the boot. Now you were trapped under the sole, and in a prison, trapping the horrid stench.
122212122111111.title: Choice 1 - into the boot you go.

choices: Nothing more to see, move along
122212122112.content:
The blonde goddess re-enters, booted feet causing a tumultuous uproar. Caught in the open, you look about yourself hurridly for somewhere to hide.

As she strides over you, you realise that she's heading for her backpack - possibly she wants to take something out of it?

She falls to her knees so as to better open the bag, and you are treated to a wonderful view of her posterior. It may be the size of a small town, but still...

Question is, do you linger here to see what she's up to, or carry on outside?
122212122112.title: Rummagings

1222121221121.content:
You wait patiently to see what this girl is up to. After all, you don't have much else to do, and her enormous, shapely behind is as beautiful a sight as any outside the tent.

Suddenly, the girl rises, and turns around. She drops to one knee and removes one boot, then the other. She sets them aside and removes her socks, and then suddenly, she removes her shirt.

Your mouth drops open as you watch the girl completely disrobe. She's not an athlete like the brunette; instead, she's got a lithe dancer's figure. You gulp as you realize that she's changing into a wisp of a bikini; she must be planning to sun herself.

She heads out of the tent. You...
1222121221121.title: Changing

1222121222.content:
It might be interesting to watch this couple in action, you think to yourself. Besides, their tent is closer to you. They step inside before you reach the tent, but not much before; it's mere moments before you enter the enormous tent.

The of them are busy trying to zip their sleeping bags together--well, why not? You smile to yourself as you survey the rest of the tent--both backpacks are off to your right, and the man and woman are setting up a bit to your left.

After sucessfully getting the sleeping bag together, the two smile, and begin necking. You watch for a moment, a literal fly on the wall, before you start to think about where you should set up camp. Do you want to go left, by the sleeping bags, or right, by the gear?
1222121222.title: Ah, Young Lust

choices: Get into the backpack and see if you can find food
Just eat what you brought and hope to find more later
12221212222.content:
You decide that for right now it might be safer to bed down near the gear, after all with the two lovers doing their thing they would hardly notice a tiny thing like you, and you know from some bits of experience that when caught up in a moment people tend to roll around a bit, and getting crushed by the two is not how you particularly want this trip to end, and with that in mind you make you way over to the gear, which is piled high in one corner of the tent.

Of course you are slightly amazed at the size of the backpacks as you get over to them, as they seem as if they would be bulky even to the two giants that are still kissing a rubbing each other in the corner, making all kinds of moaning sounds. These two, and probably their friends, must be intending on staying in the woods for quite a while, as you can see nets, fishing rods, and what look to be hunting snares, tangled in among the backpacks, one of which fell open without being noticed.

"Survivalists, maybe?" you question, but decide that it doesn't really matter. For right now you are going to be stuck here with them, and heck, after a while you fully intend on trying to get their attention, and trying to reverse whatever it is that happened to you. Thinking about that you set your own pack down right next to theirs, fully aware of the slight difference in size between what you brought, and what they did, both in proportion and in truth, and wihtout thinking about it you being to pull at the top of your pack, which is the rolled up tent you intended on sleeping in.

"Wait a second, what am I doing?" you ask yourself, looking around. As big as the tent around you is, it's still a tent. Heck, in point of fact this tent is better even that the one you had, with a bug net over the entrance and everything. You had just been lucky enough to get in before either of the two had pulled the net together, and would have to exit with them later.

Of course, this all meant that your tent was kind of superfluous, and so you set it aside without even unrolling it, and then pause again as you begin to get out some of the provisions you brought with you. Seeing as how those things you originally intended on catching and eating out in the woods will now see you as food, saving what you brought probably isn't too bad an idea, and scavenging some from your unknowing hosts might not be a bad idea either, and the backpack is sitting open right next to you.
12221212222.title: Getting Grub

choices: Jump off and hope for something better
122212122221.content:
Leaving your pack against the nearby tent wall you climb up and into the pack beside you. Luckily for you most of the traps and lines the campers brought with them are still curled up, and so pose little threat to you as you enter the pack, though you do get your foot slightly tangled in a loose fishing line for a moment, but it comes off with just a bit of wriggling, and so you continue on deeper into the pack, past the stuff on top to what laid at the bottom of the pack.

"Ok, maybe I should have thought this through some more," you admonish yourself as you get around the traps to the stuff beyond. Being a city boy you aren't too much of a camper, but you did pack the food you brought in sealed containers and bags. Having done that you should have realized that these people, who even brought their own animal snares and traps compared to you who just brought a fishing pole, would have sealed their stuff as well.

And they did indeed, as you now stare at what amounts to you to be a sandwich the size of a small house, but is double wrapped in plastic so much that you doubt you could even get at it. Not without some major wriggling anyway, and then all you'd get is to end up trapped inside the snack until someone unwrapped it and ate it, with you along for the ride.

"All right then, time to head out," you tell yourself, and begin to make your way back out of the pack. Having been inside the pack you hadn't been listening to the couple, who had finally finished their fun and had set some corner points to their tent, which would force it to keep it's shape even in strong wind, and they checked every piece of the tent's structure just to make sure it was good, which gave you time to get nice and deep into the pack, before its owner decided to pick it up.

Suddenly and without any warning that you could have recognized the whole world turns ninety degrees, and you find the floor you had been walking on is now just wall, and that the new floor is far down and away. Falling through the space littered with various junk you know you can find something to grab onto, and you begin flailing about, trying to do just that, coming to a very painful stop as one of your legs catches something and you do a slight pendulum swing before coming to a full stop.

The world, however, has not stopped, and you can feel everything shifting around as whoever grabbed it is pushing stuff around searching for something. You know that if you remain where you are you will probably be crushed, and so you quickly being to search about, but with everything moving around light begins to play tricks on you, and you can't see anything too promising, besides a small opening in front of you, which is what your foot caught on.
122212122221.title: Violent Motions

choices: "No, it's probably stagnant. Go wash it out in the stream," she advi
1222121222211.content:
You go into the opening, not sure what else you can do at this point. The drop is actually longer than you expected it to be, and so you know the landing, whatever you hit, will be rather painful, and considering the opening had been made of some kind of hard plastic it indicates that whatever you jumped into, it was made of similar stuff.

~SPLASH!~ you are startled for a second and just float where you are, not sure what the heck is going on, and not really too intent on finding out as the water you landed in churns and throws violently, and in sync with the world outside, where the person continues to go through the backpack looking for something.

"AH HA!" comes a thunderous voice, and you are thrust under the water as the container rockets skyward. You are blinded by the light entering through the hole in the ceiling, though you are now forcefully shown that the walls of the container in which you float are opaque, however even when in reverse and in the low light you recognize the lettering on the walls, which you have written on a similar container in your own pack.

"32 Ounce Canteen," you read allowed, and you realize the true extent of your situation. Somehow the cap on the canteen inside the pack had come off, and now you were stuck inside it, unbeknownst to the person who had withdrawn it from the pack, quite possible to take a drink from it. Having already pictured being eaten alive on a sandwich but minutes ago you don't even want to imagine getting drunk the same way.

"In here! Don't take a sip!!!" you scream out, but as the echo reverberates inside the canteen you realize that your cry is being buffeted by the insulation in the walls, designed to keep water or other liquids cool or hot depending on what temperature they were when they entered the canteen. Of course that means all the screaming in the world won't save you.

"Oh man, looks like the top came undone," came the voice of the guy, and you suddenly feel the world move about violently as he shakes it about.

"Still a bit of water left though. You want it?" offers the guy, an you feel the world move about again as he probably hands out the canteen to the girl.
1222121222211.title: Treading Water

choices: Take your chances and make the jump across the gap.
Continue in your search for a proper bridge.
123.content:
You begin your trek upstream in search of a narrow area in the stream or perhaps a full-fledged bridge. As the landscape rises it becomes rougher and eventually you are climbing moss-covered rock until you finally come to the point you were hoping for, a narrow area. There you find a narrow gap above a small waterfall, it looks like you could jump across if you tried but you don't know how solid the surface on the other side is. It could give away as soon as you land or it could hold and you'd be across easily. On the other hand, you could continue climbing in search of a better bridge, why you might even get to the source of the stream and just be able to walk around it.
What will you do?
123.title: The gap and the waterfall.

info.brief_description: You are going camping into the local woods when you suddenly shrink to 1 inch tall!
info.description: You have started on your way to a weekend camping trip into the local woods of the area. You are just walking out of town when you suddenly find yourself shrunk to 1 inch in height. What will you do from there?
